title: Sick and Tired of the Drama
itunes:title: Sick and Tired of the Drama
description:
Dear morning crew buckle your seat belt because you're in for a journey. I'm a 25 year old mother of two. The problem starts and ends with my mother. When I was in my early teens my mom met this man. This man turned out to be a pervert, but my mom never listened. She in turn threw me out for saying he was trying to molest me and for me fighting him back.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
